channel.title: simulators on Game Rift
channel.description: Recent content in simulators on Game Rift

item.title: Dawn Apart
item.description: Game Description In Dawn Apart, the essence is to manage the space colony and solve various problems. The focus is the collection of resources, management of production lines and protection of settlers. The users will have to build an industrial colony in a hostile alien environment, where each solution affects the future of the settlement. As the settlers arrive, it is necessary to provide them with the most necessary - food, housing and medicines so that they can survive, expanding the factory.

item.title: Don'T Messes with Bober
item.description: Game Description Don’T Messes with Bober begins with a character from the city to the city to a country house for the relaxation period. The arrival of the protagonist is conceived as an escape from the hustle and bustle, but one careless act against the local fauna completely changes the situation. This action awakens a beaver that begins the campaign of revenge against a person. The narrative was created in the spirit of horror films of the 1980s, turning a secluded location into a hostile territory.

item.title: Revengeful Ghost
item.description: Game Description Revengeful Ghost introduces Kayiti Tsujisava, a second grade student of a high school, whose twin sister Akane disappears after a message on his phone-scrap. This communication contained a video that became central in subsequent events. Soon after the loss of Akan, another student from his school takes scores with life, jumping off the roof. This second incident forces Cayiti to go to the educational institution to clarify the connection between these cases.

item.title: Limscape: The Liminal Space Explorer
item.description: Game Description Limscape: The Liminal Space Explorer offers the first -person trip to quiet, terrible environment. In this project, gamers move according to locations that demonstrate signs of linearity, striving for the exit. This gameplay develops from simple movement, including actions such as swimming, jumping, squats and climbing. Such activity translate the study from horizontal routes to vertical obstacles, increasing the player’s immersion and its interaction with unique conditions. Gamers also select and throw objects, further strengthening their influence on the world.

item.title: Click and Conquer
item.description: Game Description Click and Conquer represents a resource management system through military operations. The main gameplay is based on the discharge of bombs on the grid to detect disguised enemy detachments. Each opened unit brings currency that serves as a central resource for further development. The received funds are distributed to increase passive income and an increase in the destructive force of each ammunition. The cycle of expenses and savings determines the promotion of the player at affordable stages.

item.title: BellFortis
item.description: Game Description In BellFortis, the action takes place in the early Middle Ages, where users seek to expand their kingdoms and influence the course of history. Title combines step -by -step strategic planning and real -time battles, which gives you the opportunity to control the army and make decisions that affect the world. Would you like to build a strong empire with the help of diplomacy or strength - the choice is yours.

item.title: Rematch
item.description: Game Description Rematch is a competitive football, where, unlike traditional titles, he offers a unique interpretation of this sport, focusing on quick matches. Gamers control one character with a third person, focusing on individual skill and teamwork. The game is designed in such a way as to constantly keep users in suspense, focusing on speed and accuracy. Here each move matters, and the outcome is determined by how well users coordinate their actions and respond to pressure.

item.title: Rugby League Team Manager 4
item.description: Game Description Rugby League Team Manager 4 puts you at the head of the regional club. The circle of your tasks is covered by financial management, negotiations with sponsors and the selection of the state of assistants, mentors and medical staff. You have to improve infrastructure, including the stadium, gym and training fields. This project covers 226 teams from the Northern and Southern Hems, and over 7,000 adult players are available for choice.

item.title: GIT GUD
item.description: Game Description Git Gud is a head-headed game, the action of which takes place in the command line interface, where players have to overcome difficulties related to versions management. The main gameplay is to analyze verbal descriptions and input the correct, functional Git commands for passing 100 levels. The initial stages are introduced to basic concepts, such as the preparation of the first commune and the use of branches for new functions.

item.title: IDLE WATERS
item.description: Game Description IDLE WATERS is a game in the IDLE-Rybank genre that works from the window at the bottom of the screen and is designed to simultaneously work with other computer operations. The game window has flexibility: it can be scale, change the layout, change the size and move to any part of the desktop or completely hide. This system allows the simulator to function without requiring constant attention from the gamer.

item.title: VOID War
item.description: Game Description Void War puts a player at the head of an ancient starship, sending him on a journey to the heart of a dying empire. This ship is described as a powerful and formidable gun filled with secret technologies. The tasks include the reflection of the attacks of crazy cultists, cowardly cosmopirates and xenophobic imperial soldiers. The detection of powerful artifacts allows you to turn a starship into a frightening combat vehicle.

item.title: Fuga: Melodies of Steel 3
item.description: Game Description fuga: Melodies of Steel 3 unfolds the story of desperate efforts. The inexplicable disappearance of Malta forces the group of children to head to the forbidden cave, where they are leaded by a mysterious voice to Taranis - a powerful armored vehicle, which was considered lost. The determination to find Malta returns them aboard this combat vehicle, starting a direct attack on the central regions of the Berman Empire.

item.title: Zombie Cure Lab
item.description: Game Description Zombie Cure Lab - this is an opportunity to plunge into a colorful sandbox-laboratory, in which gamers have to put a variety of experiments on zombies. Scientists find a way to begin to control monsters that will be able to turn into hybrid creatures, half-dead people. Now you have to find a full medicine to calm and cure all the injured humanity from the disease of zombie. Users will build walls and fences to protect complexes with scientists.

item.title: Contractville
item.description: Game Description Contraactville beckoning lovers of simulators with their history about how to turn from rags into rich. Forget about gorgeous houses, you start with a penny in a port town. But do not be afraid, starting a tycoon! In Contractville you can build your own fate yourself by demolition, construction and interior design. And what is interesting: you can sell your architectural masterpieces at the auction, turning your sweat and ingenuity into cold, firm money.

item.title: Clink
item.description: Game Description Clink puts a player in the role of a woman living in voluntary solitude in an old house only with her cat and buried memories. The central conflict lies in the question of whether its experiences are symptoms of a prescribed disease or a manifestation of something otherworldly. One morning, the familiar way of the heroine is broken: one of the doors is locked, the key disappeared, and a metal ringing echoed in his head.

item.title: Tinkerlands
item.description: Game Description Tinkerlands offers game experience where the characters find themselves in unknown islands. Survival becomes the main task that encourages the study of these new territories, the creation of the necessary tools and contacts with various inhabitants of these lands. Gamers gradually build personal shelters that can develop into large settlements. Interaction with the environment also opens access to magic, giving additional ways to overcome difficulties. The Tinkerlands universe consists of the main continent, three other large islands and many small islands, each of them provides unique conditions, resources and tests.

item.title: Ultimate Fishing Simulator 2
item.description: Game Description Ultimate Fishing Simulator 2 - fishing simulator, offering to participate in a huge number of tests and demonstrate many different techniques. Use a wide set of tools and gear: feeder, overlap, spinning, classic float and much more. Continuation of the game significantly improves the graphic component, adds many mechanics, tools and improves all aspects of the gameplay. More and better - the basic principle of Ultimate Fishing Simulator 2.

item.title: Chronomon
item.description: Game Description Chronomon combines elements of monsters care and the simulation of the farm. Players find themselves in the world after a disaster, where they have to catch unusual creatures, improve their skills and help in restoration. Communication with the settlers and step -by -step battles complement the process of arranging their own allotment of land, and the main task is to form a detachment of pets and control of resources in the proposed conditions.

item.title: Doloc Town
item.description: Game Description Doloc Town - this is a farm simulator in the conditions of post -apocalypse. The player accepts the role of a beginner whose task is to build an existing economy in the desert territory. The environment pushes to the study of its predominantly unexplored areas. Key activity includes the landing of cultures, the construction of the necessary structures and the consistent search for information about the past of this changed world.

item.title: Tank Squad
item.description: Game Description Tank Squad transfers players during the Second World War, to the most intense territories, whose fate will affect the outcome of the clash. The user will visit the role of captain of the tank detachment, taking part in the iconic battles of that time. Scenarios will include historical battles for a single -user or cooperative passage of three participants at the same time. In the multiplayer, each gamer is able to control their own team, or unite among themselves and become a separate crew member.

item.title: Teddy's Haven - A Fantasy Inspired Shop Simulator
item.description: Game Description Teddy’s Haven - A Fantasy Inspired Shop Simulator puts the player in the role of the owner who controls a small store on the periphery of the mysterious island. The shop specializes in the sale of potions, weapons and various magic wonders for a variety of clientele. Among the buyers are adventurers preparing for campaigns, magicians in search of rare components and other mystical creatures. The main cycle of classes is to replenish the shelves, manage the inventory, set up each aspect of the interior and hiring employees.

item.title: Hollywood Mogul 4
item.description: Game Description Hollywood Mogul 4 — это текстовый бизнес-симулятор, ставящий человека во главе киностудии. Система позволяет создавать кинофильмы и мини-сериалы на основе библиотеки из более чем 14 000 исходных материалов или собственных идей. Ready -made paintings can be planned for global film distribution or for distribution through streaming service. The process includes the formation of accurate budgets, the conclusion of agreements on rental in 19 foreign territories and the management of advertising expenses.

item.title: Synergy
item.description: Game Description synergy dedicated to survival on a hostile planet. In this urban planning strategy, players have to develop their city, face natural cataclysms and make the right decisions that will certainly have consequences. Explore this constantly changing world, preserving the happiness of the townspeople in extreme weather conditions. Gamers will control the weather, seasons, extreme conditions and natural disasters. The main goal is to build a city where residents will be happy and satisfied, respecting the natural needs of the inhabitants and living in harmony with the local fauna and flora.

item.title: Kadomon: Hyper Auto Battlers
item.description: Game Description Kadomon: Hyper Auto Battlers calls the gamarines into a world filled with more than 180 creatures who need to collect, fight and develop. The Title combines the elements of autoboeviks, rogeliks and card battles, allowing users to develop unique strategies. The purpose of the game is to assemble the KDOMON team, each of which has various abilities and types in order to pass more and more difficult tests. As you pass, you will encounter powerful bosses and open rare monsters with special abilities.

item.title: Voiceatc Simulator
item.description: Game Description Voiceatc Simulator is a simulator that puts a player in the role of an air traffic controller, where voice communication serves as a main tool for managing aircraft. The main gameplay is to build arriving sides for landing and their maintenance on strips created on the basis of real airfield schemes. You give oral teams for vectoring, changing the echelon, adjusting speed and execution of transitions, effectively controlling the sky.

item.title: Pocket City 2
item.description: Game Description Pocket City 2 makes it possible for players to build cities, and then study their first -person creations. The process starts from the laying of roads, the markings of sections for residential, commercial or industrial needs and the construction of the necessary objects on the map. Control over the economy implies monitoring of stocks, profit and a thoughtful placement of special structures, access to which opens as they move.

item.title: inzoi
item.description: Game Description Inzoi is a life -symbol game in which gamers assign the role of the creator and observer in a detailed virtual community. In a dynamic environment, users can interact with various characters known as Zoe. These characters are not connected by actions recorded in the script, but act of their own free will, controlled by more than 400 mental elements that form their behavior and solutions. Result? A constantly developing world in which rumors spread, trends and even diseases appear.

item.title: A Merchant's Promise
item.description: Game Description A Merchant’s Promise Places the player in the stylized Middle Ages, concentrated on commerce and transportation through direct physical handling of objects. The path begins with the role of a worthless merchant, who is instructed to manually move goods using a system based on physics. There is no usual inventory here; Each object needs to be raised, carried and placed, which creates a constant risk of dropping or even throwing a luggage.

item.title: Kaiserpunk
item.description: Game Description Kaiserpunk throws you headlong into an alternative XX century, instructing to build an empire from scratch. This is not Grandfather’s Urban planner - Title offers a grandiose strategy, demanding from you to win a vast card, while preserving the residents happy, and the factory - working. Does it sound like a high task? This is true. Forget that you can just put at home and finish it on this.

item.title: Call of Boba
item.description: Game Description Call of Boba transfers to a small, bizarre town, where they find themselves in the role of assistants, helping to revive the destructive Bob tea store. At first, the task is simple: to cook delicious drinks, attract customers and develop business. But underground is hiding something more. With the onset of night, a completely new world opens, and this is where real adventures begin. Armed with the ingredients for Bob milk tea, users fight enemies to get inspiration for the creations of the store.

item.title: Astronomics
item.description: Game Description In Astronomics, gamers are sent to study the space and the production of asteroids. You have to move through randomly generated asteroids, extract resources and manage a developing enterprise. At first, the whole thing is assembling materials on asteroids flying past, but as it moves forward, automation becomes a key factor. With workers and command bots, at your disposal, the tasks for which the clock used to go, can be completed much faster.

item.title: Keep Driving
item.description: Game Description Keep Driving immerses in the atmosphere of freedom of a long, slow trip to the procedurally generated world. The action takes place in the early 2000s, you are behind the wheel of your first car, a long road and a festival are ahead, which you need to get to the other end of the country. Passing along the highway and dirt roads, you are faced with difficulties, both from the environment and from the bizarre hitchhiker, looking for a passage.

item.title: Heart of the Machine
item.description: Game Description Heart of the Machine outwardly resembles a town -planning Taikun. But in fact, the project is something like a god of God with elements of tactics and strategy in real time. Only here the Juzer is assigned the role of not a divine being, which owns magic, but artificial intelligence. This video game has a science fiction setting. Its action takes place in a distant and gloomy future in the territory of the metropolis-colonies.

item.title: Space Engineers 2
item.description: Game Description Space Engineers 2 returns to the world of space development with updated experience. In this continuation, you will have a new adventure in the Almagest system, where engineering tasks and spaces of space are combined in the most unexpected way. This is a sandbox with an open world in which you can build from scratch - or, rather, from stars - from starships to entire space stations. The goal is simple: to raise your creative potential to a new height, while managing the difficulties of survival in the cold, inexorable spaces of space.

item.title: Learning Factory
item.description: Game Description learning factory - a simulator that is designed to create an automated process of processes and, most importantly, understand one simple truth: what do cats want? The gameplay allows you to head the Kotovod factory. It was once closed, but now it has been possible to renew the process and create your own cat store. Learning factory gameplay largely gives an idea of ​​how machine learning works. Your factory is analyzing a huge database, trying to study the behavior of pets.

item.title: IDUN
item.description: Game Description Idun throws you into a hostile world, teeming with resources and teeming with enemies. This is a genre mixing in which in real time the strategy is combined with the protection of the tower, which gives a unique experience. Your mission? To capture all the most valuable and get out alive. But this is not a light walk. Enemy hordes are teeming on the battlefield, tirelessly pursuing your base.

item.title: Diddy
item.description: Game Description Diddy begins with a mission to destroy a dark party held in a private estate. Players in the Company of Eminam and 51 Centers must stop the owner’s atrocities and stop the meeting. The main task is the salvation of Justin B, who is in the territory after the accumulation of a state fraud. The detachment confronts the army of Selebri, acting as a guards, ready to defend the estate and its owner.

item.title: Anime City
item.description: Game Description Anime City transfers gamers to a bright 3D virtual Tokyo, inspired by anime culture. Title combines the mechanics of the visual novel and sandbox, creating an interactive environment, focused on everyday life, social interactions and school experience. Users stand in the place of a high school student, moving along a dynamic, fictitious city landscape, interacting with the characters, exploring key places and participating in various events. Title offers many ways to plunge into this detailed city - from clubs after lessons to public events and part -time work.

item.title: Zephon
item.description: Game Description Gamers in Zephon have to take control of the remnants of mankind in order to survive on the territory of the Earth. On the planet, there are few areas that are not suitable for life, and most of the cities were destroyed. In wild territories are mutating creatures that they gather in small groups and begin to hunt for surviving people. Alien robots with damaged systems roam on the surface, and the aliens themselves are hidden and try to secure survival.

item.title: Citadelum
item.description: Game Description Citadelum throws its hat to the ring of strategic games, offering the experience of building cities with an admixture of mythology and strategic conquests. Ancient Rome serves as a background for the game: gamers take control of a nascent settlement and should turn it into a lively metropolis. Resource management is a paramount task for any novice urban planner. But Citadelum is not only overgrown suburbs and towering monuments.

item.title: Eden Crafters
item.description: Game Description Eden Crafters throws glove in the hands of survival and automation lovers. In this cooperative adventure with the open world, players will turn to turn a hostile planet into a hospitable refuge for humanity. Think about this as a space project of reconstruction - harsh conditions, fluids of the house of dreams. Task? Overcome the unpleasant habits of the planet and build a new house for humanity. Imagine radioactive zones and insidious landscapes are not the best real estate.

item.title: Liar's bar
item.description: Game Description Liar’s Bar is a multi -user online game, whose action takes place in a bar, where deception and strategy play a key role. Users are united at tables of four people to take part in games such as Liar’s Dice and Liar’s Deck. The goal is to outwit rivals using bliff and strategic moves. Each session is filled with stress, as gamers are trying to unravel each other’s intentions and make the right moves to win.

item.title: Pinball Spire
item.description: Game Description Pinball Spire challenges the world, combining the classic pinball mechanics with elements of research and development for a unique adventure. You take control of a pee, a brave character, whose determination plays a key role - both in the plot and in how you play. The essence of Pinball Spire is to manage a mysterious spire that suddenly appeared in the world of a pipa. This is not an ordinary pinball table.

item.title: Endzone 2
item.description: Game Description Endzone 2 throws you into the thick of the post -apocalyptic world. Humanity died, and you remained to collect fragments - literally. Each decision that you make as if you can send your scattered colony by the line. Lack of resources? Eat. Danger to the environment? Do not hesitate. Ruthless raiders eager to steal your lunch? Undoubtedly. This is not a simple walk. This is the management of your nascent civilization.

item.title: ODD Realm
item.description: Game Description ODD Realm is a game that combines both the strategy and the survival simulator. The player will have to take on the role of the leader of a small settlement and provide residents with the necessary resources, houses, as well as protect their subjects from bloodthirsty enemies and dishonest bandits from a high road. The variability of the development of the plot provides the gamer with wide opportunities for the construction of the city of his own dreams.

item.title: Norland
item.description: Game Description Medieval setting in** Norland** shows interactive stories that will happen to the royal family. Players will manage the birth that controls the city. We will have to observe the activities of ordinary workers, peasants, slaves, soldiers and criminals. Each character has needs, as well as a unique character. Users will have to distribute instructions for family members in order to put order in the urban district. We will have to take power into your own hands, dealing with different economic or military spheres.

item.title: E-Startup 2: Business Tycoon
item.description: Game Description E-Startup 2: Business Tycoon throws you headlong into the world of product management. Development, production, sale - all this is on your conscience. Fasten the belts because you will also have to juggle with resources, monitor the constantly changing market and make sure that your office does not turn into a productivity cemetery. Do you think you have the next big thing? Title will allow you to bring your concept from a sketch on a napkin to a store shelf.

item.title: Echoes of the Plum Grove
item.description: Game Description Echoes of the Plum Grove is a casual adventure that promises you to transfer you to the calm town of Hanwood, where a new life awaits you. But keep in mind, this is not an ordinary farm simulator! Get ready for surprises, because you have to build a flourishing farm community that will exist for many generations. You will begin your journey as a newly -made owner of a modest plot of land on the island.

item.title: Keeperrl
item.description: Game Description Keeperrl is a simulator with elements of a slide in which it is necessary to build an underground base and develop society. You play for a powerful wizard studying black magic. Teach minions to military affairs, forcing to attack civilians of settlements, taking their belongings and burning to the ground at home. Engage in the construction of the dungeons, arrange traps and build up military power to storm miserable people.

item.title: Le Mans Ultimate
item.description: Game Description Le Mans Ultimate - The official game FIA ​​World Enduraance Championship and “24 hours of Le Man”, promises exciting experience to both experienced riders and beginners. Runned in early access, the game offers to try the exciting season of 2023 with official cars, legendary tracks and online media. Sit behind the wheel of ultramodern hypercars from manufacturers such as Toyota, Ferrari and Porsche, and recreate the battles on prestigious tracks.

item.title: My Recycling Center
item.description: Game Description My Recycling Center puts you in the place of the owner of the waste processing enterprise, which is instructed to sort, compact and ultimately turn garbage into valuable resources. In this first -person simulator, you will plunge with your head into the world of waste management. Clients arrive with various loads - from crumpled paper to bulky furniture. Your task is to quickly evaluate and sort their garbage to special containers.

item.title: Underdogs
item.description: Game Description Underdogs - this is the Title in virtual reality, in which gamers fall into the very heart of the gloomy Cyberpanovsky world, where the fight of the furs reigns. The project does not hold back itself, pushing you with fierce enemies in cruel contractions. From the very first minutes, gamers plunge into the world of risk, where every step can mean the difference between life and death. Here you need to not just fight, but survive in conditions when the danger lurks around every angle.

item.title: Alaskan Road Truckers
item.description: Game Description ALASKAN ROAD TRUCKERS - A car simulator in which you will become a driver of huge trucks, being a trucker in snowy Alaska. Call a challenge of one of the most severe and dangerous environments that could only be in such simulators. Test your strength and try to survive in a harsh environment. At the same time, you will have the opportunity to see the stunning beauty of this northern region.

item.title: Nuclear Option
item.description: Game Description In the game** Nuclear Option** you will find yourself in the cabin of modern combat aircraft on the battlefield of the near future, where the roar of engines and the crackling of tracers draw a bright picture of air battles. Each plane, from agile fighters to bulky bombers, is asked in hands, and its cabin pulsates with vital information while you scan targets and evade fire. The world unfolds under you - a dynamic tapestry of vast landscapes, raging seas and bristling enemy objects.

item.title: Railgrade
item.description: Game Description Railgrade gameplay combines elements of strategy and construction. The plot covers the times of the great construction of railways around the world in order to connect fast transportation between foreign cities with valuable industry. The main character will save the future of mankind, since he is the last employee of the earth colony. Megacorporations asked him to fulfill a difficult mission and save everything that remained on the planet after the disaster that occurred due to errors in the calculations of management.

item.title: Rise of the White Sun
item.description: Game Description Rise of the White Sun transfers to the chaos of China of the 1920s, the period of riots and fragmented leadership. In this grandiose strategic game, you have to pave the way through a fragmented nation controlled by military leaders, rebels and political groups. The action unfolds at a time when various groups dispute control of vast territories and armies, each of which has its own goals, objectives and motives.

item.title: The Backrooms: Last Expedition
item.description: Game Description The BackRooms: Last Expedition is a cooperative in the horror genre, in which from 1 to 4 gamers are united in teams to survive in an alarming world. The main attention is paid to the passage of a series of dangerous, constantly changing levels, each of which is filled with mysterious creatures. Together, players should try to escape from the horror surrounding them, using their collective forces to resist the unknown.

item.title: Pumping Simulator 2
item.description: Game Description Pumping Simulator 2 sends you on a trip to the world of management of gas stations. Start your entrepreneurial adventure by the sale of a classic car to get the funds necessary for the reconstruction of an abandoned gas station in a busy city. Your goal is to turn an abandoned station into a prosperous center for local residents and travelers. From the very beginning, you will build, expand and modernize your gas station.

item.title: High Sea Saga DX
item.description: Game Description High Sea Saga DX immerses players in the marine environment, focused on the accumulation of wealth and global research. In this Title, gamers control the pirate team crossing the oceans in search of hidden treasures scattered through a variety of geographical zones. Each such journey entails a clash with various wild creatures and battles with warring pirate fractions that pursue similar goals. Success requires the collection of an effective detachment and the construction of a swimming agent, ready for long -term crossings by open waters.

item.title: Railway Empire 2
item.description: Game Description Railway Empire 2 is a transport strategy that offers to go into the past, at the beginning of the 19th century, and lead a small railway company, which will become the leader of the economy thanks to steam cars. Here you have to compete with competitors and build a network of railways, which will connect cities and companies throughout the continent. At your disposal 60 famous steam machines that pull freight and passenger cars, opening the historically significant era of the time of the industrial revolution.

item.title: Tiny Life
item.description: Game Description The developers** Tiny Life** were inspired by The Sims series, trying to transfer the gameplay to their own project. The gameplay presents pixel graphics and the vast capabilities of the simulator of the life of controlled characters. Before the start of the passage, the player can choose a certain group of people, one ward or use the function of creating. In Tiny Life, the user will have to control all aspects of the life of a group of people living together in the same house.

item.title: Pinball FX
item.description: Game Description Pinball FX is not a dusty arcade machine of your father. This digital pinball takes a classic game and injects steroids into it. Forget about awkward management and faded decorations - the title offers a bright collection of tables, each of which has its own unique quirks and goals. Fight the aliens on Mars, worry Christmas with Charlie Brown or save the world along with cult films. Diversity does not allow to get bored, offering something for every user.

item.title: Contraband Police
item.description: Game Description Contraband Police - The simulator of the border guard in the first person. The player in the role of the commander of the border post makes an inspection of transport for the presence of smuggling on the border of the third world countries. The inspection tasks include: checking documents: inspection and permit for entry criminals … or take a bribe. What? Nobody heard this! To carry out reports on the successful completion of tasks through the mail; the accumulated experience can be spent on pumping the department, buying new equipment or training dogs;

item.title: Winter Falling: Battle Tactics
item.description: Game Description Winter Falling: Battle Tactics invites gamers to lead the troops and lead them to victory in the most stressful and tactical battles. And only your mind can save the dying world from devastation. You control a detachment of mercenaries, collect supplies and troops, perform tasks and even you can burn villages if you decide that you need it. But do not forget that all your actions have consequences.

item.title: Out of Ore
item.description: Game Description In Out of Ore, gamers have to take many heavy equipment under their control, with the help of which it will be possible to extract ore, move the ground, dig pits, build or repair buildings and much more. It is necessary to test yourself as a driver of construction equipment, which is intended for various purposes. The main character goes on the plot for the very north of the country where there is a small base from Company Mining Corp.

item.title: Virtual Sailor NG
item.description: Game Description Virtual Sailor NG is a simulator with the open world, concentrated on the management of water vessels. The physical system of the project reproduces marine dynamics and behavior of various boats on the water. This allows gamers to direct vessels anywhere within the environment, which opens up scope for research. Players master all forms of sailing, using the first -person species and 6 degrees of freedom. Both single and multiplayer regime are available.

item.title: WTC: Relentless Protagonist [sxs]
item.description: Game Description WTC: Relentless Protagonist [sxs] - this is a visual short story with two -dimensional graphics. She imitates anime drawing. The atmosphere combines drama, comedy and thriller. There are scenes with violence in the game. Title includes 102 scenes, and his script consists of 73,000 words. The plot has 3 endings and 2 epilogue. The video game is designed for about 6-8 hours of passage. The gameplay traditionally for the genre consists of considering pictures, reading the text and periodic decision -making.

item.title: Way of the Hunter
item.description: Game Description Way of the Hunter gives an excellent opportunity to become the owner of his own hunting house in the middle of a deaf forest and periodically go hunting in search of extreme and valuable production. This simulator offers a very realistic experience, as it takes into account many factors and allows you to plunge into a huge completely open virtual world, which looks like alive. It exists regardless of the action of the user - the weather, the time of day changes dynamically, and all the animals sleep, eat, move in search of a safer place.

item.title: Flight of Nova
item.description: Game Description Flight of Nova is a simulator that allows you to sit in a cosmic shuttle cabin and explore a galaxy called Nova. Make interstellar flights and examine the continents using cosmoshattl. Management is completely focused on physics and aerodynamics. Feel the weight and bulkiness of transport, and also experience a feeling of piloting with a bulky car in zero gravity. Explore the surroundings near the NVA-31 planet. Train to manage the ship, choosing one of several available cargo shutters.

item.title: Venture Towns
item.description: Game Description Venture Towns allows players to build a city landscape. This project transfers to the gamers the corporation forming a settlement. From the initial structures to vast skyscrapers, the player leads the development, striving for economic superiority. The game emphasizes the deliberate arrangement of various architectural elements, contributing to a systematic approach to urbanistic growth and current economic activity. In Venture Towns, the processes of the construction of objects open the ways for development.

item.title: City Game Studio: A Tycoon ABOUT GAME DEV
item.description: Game Description City Game Studio: A Tycoon ABOUT GAME DEV is a strategic simulator in which it is important not only to chase the demand of players, but also be able to reduce expenses and vice versa, be able to spend money where they are actually needed. Games developers presented a simulator in which you will have to develop a company that develops games. A small studio creating video games decided to expand, so you must make every effort to create a whole headquarters of developers who can satisfy the needs of modern gamers.

item.title: The Doors of Trithius
item.description: Game Description The Doors of Trithius is a RPG -Rogalik in the fantasy world with procedurally generated content. Here you have to fight monsters, avoid traps, collect prey and much more, traveling along the mysterious world of Enalia. Every time you start the game, you have to explore the new generated city, dungeon and map of the world. Movement and battle use a unique time system, returning the priority of the player based on the speed of weapons or action, maintaining tactical decisions, as well as knowledge about your enemies.

item.title: Wrestling Empire
item.description: Game Description In Wrestling Empire the player becomes a participant in the World Lightweight Championship. It is necessary to manage an athlete in the ring, apply his abilities and win rivals. The battles are presented in real time with extensive visual effects. This part includes a smooth frequency of personnel and modern graphics, while leaving the atmosphere of retro-style. This version has more functions and capabilities in pumping and battles. The user will face unique opponents with the original characteristic and special skills.

item.title: Going Medieval
item.description: Game Description Going Medieval is a simulator in which you need to build a fortress on the ruins of an old castle and equip it to protect your settlement. Any event can affect the mood of your people, so you need to satisfy all their needs and be a good king. Events unfold in the era of the dark Middle Ages of the late XIV century. Only five percent of the population survived after a heavy plague epidemic.

item.title: Easy Red 2
item.description: Game Description Easy Red 2 is a first -person shooter with elements of a strategy that immerses in an authentic atmosphere of World War II. The gameplay can plunge into tense and cruel battles, where the main thing is planning and tactics. The gameplay relies on realism. Take a break through the tanks and the enemy’s huge army. Do not fall into the explosion zone and look for ways to survive on the battlefield with your partners.

item.title: Ostriv
item.description: Game Description OSTRIV, this is a city -building simulator that makes you the ruler of the monarch of the 18th century. The player will have to work hard and show his ability to the manager, as well as creative abilities. The goal of the game to transfer the gameplay of simulators of this kind to a new level, by means of adding a huge number of opportunities and abandoning the usual restrictions.

item.title: On the Western Front
item.description: Game Description On the Western Front - this is a tactical strategy, the action of which unfolds against the background of the First World War, namely on the infamous Western Front. Users take on the role of the division commander, who are instructed to manage various aspects of military operations in one of the most exhausting and complex periods in history. The Title emphasizes the harsh realities of the trench war, where the soldiers are faced with many problems, from the constant threat of enemy fire to the constant need to manage resources.

item.title: Mad Restaurant People
item.description: Game Description Mad Restaurant People makes it possible to feel all the difficulty of working as a waiter. The game is presented with a top distance, which makes it possible to observe the entire hall at once. Take orders, serve customers, serve dishes in time, count the guests and much more. Mad Restaurant People is a full -fledged waiter’s simulator who will not let you relax for a second. The gameplay requires attentiveness, reaction speed, good memory and many other important qualities.

item.title: PayDay 2
item.description: Game Description Re-join thePayDay 2 gang as Dallas, Hoxton, Chains or Wolfe, who have come to Washington to rob and make a lot of money. Put the mask on your favorite hero and set off to carry out your next crime, in which you will need to overcome many obstacles before reaching your goal. Now you will have a wide variety of contracts to choose from, from which you can choose any one.

item.title: Salvus: Aries
item.description: Game Description Salvus: aries throws you headlong into the afterlife. Here death is not the end, but a new beginning, although gloomy. You wake up a nameless soul in purgatory, and Rubilovo is just a memory. It turns out that your past life was not entirely sunny and rainbow, and now you are serving a sentence as a reap. You must collect souls until your debt to the universe is paid.

item.title: Another Farm Roguelike: Rebirth
item.description: Game Description Another Farm Roguelike: Rebirth abandoned long walks and romantic novels with stars that are found in other farm sigas. It’s enough just to click a cursor. The Title with a strategic farm bias with your head immerses you in the creation, construction, collection and management of a prosperous farm. Starting from a modest site, do not allow the initial sizes to deceive you. Another Farm Roguelike: Rebirth is all about potential.

item.title: Drive Beyond Horizons
item.description: Game Description Drive Beond Horizons Refuses the line path and throws gamers into a huge, constantly changing world. Fasten the belts and get ready for the study - the procedurally generated landscapes make each game unique. Leave the comfort zone and choose your own route. Travel through spacious deserts, lush forests, on any roads (or their absence). But this is not just an excursion trip. Drive Beond Horizons is fraught with many secrets and difficulties that have to be solved.

item.title: Let's Build a Zoo
item.description: Game Description Let’s Build a Zoo - A bright sandbox with a simulator elements, which provides players with the opportunity to build their own zoo. It is required to install enclosures, buy rare animals, hire employees for service and much more. It is allowed to cross animal DNA, producing more than 300,000 unique rocks into the world. In order for the reserve to function, it will be necessary to hire veterinarians, trainers, cleaners, repairmen and other performers who support their lives in the zoo.

item.title: Schedule I
item.description: Game Description Schedule 1 puts a gamer in the place of a small drug dealer trying to build a criminal empire from scratch. The action takes place in the gloomy city of Highland Point, and users get the opportunity to expand the scale of their activities, controlling everyone - from production to sales. You will begin with an empty wallet and the necessary connections, gradually rising to control over the criminal world.
